```{r init, include = FALSE}
# These lines of code facilitate the Project Template package within a markdown document.
# munging = FALSE prevents ProjectTemplate from automatically running the scripts in the munge directory, data_loading = TRUE prevents ProjectTemplate from loading data from the data directory by default but will still load data from the cache (this prevents long operations from being repeated if they are run once and ouput stored to the cache).
library(ProjectTemplate)
wd <- getwd()
setwd("../")
load.project(munging = FALSE, data_loading = TRUE)
setwd(wd)

# Load packages and add citation information to packages.bib
# By default, packages listed in global.dcf are ignored and environment initiation is handled by .RProfile.
library(repmis)
LoadandCite(pkgs = c("tidyverse", "lubridate", "ProjectTemplate", "repmis", "biometrics", "kableExtra", "broom", "GGally", "lme4"),
            file = "assets/bib/packages.bib")

```
